entry.value: { "type": "record", "name": "loan_application", "fields": [ {"name": "age", "type": ["null", "int"], "default": null}, {"name": "income", "type": ["null", "double"], "default": null}, {"name": "credit_score", "type": ["null", "int"], "default": null}, {"name": "loan_amount", "type": ["null", "double"], "default": null}, {"name": "loan_purpose", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null}, {"name": "employment_status", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null}, {"name": "payment_history", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null}, {"name": "risk_rating", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null} ] }

SELECT Age AS age, Income AS income, "Credit Score" AS credit_score, "Loan Amount" AS loan_amount, "Loan Purpose" AS loan_purpose, "Employment Status" AS employment_status, "Payment History" AS payment_history, "Risk Rating" AS risk_rating FROM FLOWFILE WHERE income IS NOT NULL
